originalText.text: I first found Dr. Sachs’ office around 2004 when my boyfriend and I lived around the corner and it was convenient. Three moves and twenty years later, my husband, our two kids and I travel a lot further for our visits with Dr. Sachs and Dr. Cruz. They are thoughtful, funny, and caring professionals. Over the decades and among all four patients we’ve had a variety of dental problems and procedures, all treated by Dr. Sachs and Dr. Cruz with knowledge, skill and personal attention. The staff is very friendly, scheduling is easy, there are always new and varied magazines in the waiting room…but I never get to read them because I rarely ever have to wait. Couldn’t be happier to visit the dentist!

originalText.text: I've been a patient here for over ten years.  By far the most consistent, reliable and professional dentist I've seen in my life and I've seen may others prior to finding this gem.  I've had a few fillings, crowns etc. and all were done without any noticeable discomfort.   If you dread going to the dentist try out these guys; you won't be disappointed!!   10/10 all the way!

originalText.text: I have been a patient for over two decades.  Whatever the issue - from a cleaning to oral surgery - Dr. Sachs and Dr. Cruz are excellent as is their staff.

originalText.text: Dr. Sachs and his associates are skilled, thorough, and extremely kind. They are the only professionals I trust with my teeth.

originalText.text: dr cruz and his staff are always friendly and caring. they really do care about their patients and makes recommending them very easy to do.
